content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were laying in a hammock enjoying an unusually clear night sky.  the moon was near full but had not risen yet so the milky way was clearly visible as well as many other constellations that are normally difficult to see. we saw many satellites and a couple of shooting stars.  we even saw one satellite flash us as it's solar panels must have reflected light from the moon or sun briefly.  about 10:10 pm or so (i'm judging from the time we went outside to the time we saw the object. neither of us had a watch or phone with us), i saw what i just assumed was a satellite moving across the sky in a west/southwest direction.  what confused me is that it was flashing.  about once a second it would get approximately twice as bright as a typical satellite.  my wife noticed it shortly after i did, as i was still trying to figure out what it was.  she asked me what it was and suggested that it was an airplane.  there were a couple of large jets flying over at the time traveling in a similar direction.  i told her that it wasn't a plane of any kind.  there were no colored lights and the only light similar to one we were seeing would be landing lights.  they don't flash and they point forward.  i couldn't tell where this light was "pointed" but it did not seem to be any kind of landing light from a plane.  the light was typically a slight shade of blue and flashed brightly white.  again, the light was similar to a satellite.  i suggested that maybe it was a fast spinning satellite that was repeatedly flashing us.  in fact, told the wife that had to be what it was.  it was traveling faster than the jets in the area and quickly caught up to and passed one of the jets while continuing in a straight line from straight above us, where we first noticed it, to about 15 degrees above the western horizon.  i was content with the idea that it was a rotating satellite and was pleased to see something that i had not seen before.  then as i continued to watch it, it slowed down in it's path and slowly changed course.  this happened quite slowly and i questioned if i was really seeing it move out of it's original trajectory.  my wife asked if i saw it change direction, i confirmed and we began intently watching it now moving in a northerly direction from our perspective.  it could have been moving west or east as well which was difficult to determine from our perspective, but the light did not appear to be getting brighter or more dim. although at this point it was far enough away that we could only casually see it when it was bright.  the flashing consistency never noticeably changed from the roughly 1 second interval.  it continued to move what appeared to be north, very slowly, until it passed behind the tree line near our property.  the whole experience lasted maybe 8-10 mins.  we discussed what we had just seen for several minutes and could not come up with any reasonable explanation.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsating light traveling straight like a satellite but then changed direction.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It started 2 nights ago, on 08/20/16,  my brother was driving home at about 10:15 pm when he saw the object flying in the air. it was a single glowing red-orange light floating about 150 feet in the air, irregularly pulsating. he immediately could tell it wasn’t a plane or helicopter, as he came closer to the neighborhood he said that the light grew in intensity and brightness before flashing and emanating what he described as “sparks and drops of liquid metal”. 

i was at home at the time, i was organizing some papers when i heard a loud explosion, i couldn’t tell if it was a gunshot or fireworks but didn’t think too much of it. when my brother arrived home he told me to come outside and check out the strange light. it definitely wasn’t a plane or helicopter, my first thought was a quadcopter drone. but those are often loud and usually have red and green lights. this was a single orange light that was floating silently from southwest to northeast.. i was only able to see it for about 5 minutes before it just suddenly vanished. frustratingly, it disappeared before i could get any pictures. 

it happened a second time tonight, i was staying up late doing some reading and i heard an extremely loud and percussive boom from outside, it sounded like a grenade went off across the street. i ran outside to see what was happening, dogs were barking all around the neighborhood because of the sound. i thought about the light from 2 nights ago and started looking up to see if it was there, sure enough, the same glowing orange light was silently floating above my neighborhood, this time it was much higher in altitude, maybe 500-1000 feet. again, it  was floating from southwest to northeast, irregularly pulsing in a red-orange hue. a bit redder than a campfire usually is. this time though, it kept moving until it suddenly stopped moving and was stationary in the sky. i was able to get an old telescope out to get a better look, i couldn’t see any definite features. even in the telescope it was just an orange light. to the naked eye it looked completely stationary, but in the telescope you see it slowing moving around, hovering in place.

it slowly faded away until it disappeared. this time i was able to capture a few pictures of it on my cellphone, which doesn’t show much other than a dot in the sky, but it does show up. very weird experiences, pretty spooky! i’m going to keep an eye out and study it more if it happens again.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing orange light that makes explosion sounds

content.detailedDescription: During a sleepovet with my cousins when i was younger a craft descended into the neighborhood. it lit up the neighborhood so bright. me my cousins went to see. we witnessed a ufo hovering above the willow tree in the backyard. it was a strange disc with lights blinking in patterns. the corner lights started to blink rapidly until a beam shot out. the beam shot into the woods where 4 beings appeared.Shortly after they appeared we noticed suvs pulling up to the neighbors. there was an unmarked ambupance tpyed vehicle as well. men with suits came out with machines in there hands.When they entered the backyard the ufo shot up into the sky and was gone. they told everyone 5o never mention this to anyone and it wad a methane explosion of some kind.
content.summary: It hovered over the willow tree in my grandparents backyard as it came down it illluminated the neighborhood to almost daylight

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my parent's house, and i have seen these things more than once before there. i often see them when i am on the back deck having a cigarette, often late at night and into the early hours of the morning is when i see the objects. from a distance they look as if they have a part that separates from the main light, which always has blue, green and red lights that change the way they flash, but you can clearly see it seperate and then retract back into the main part. i have observed them with binoculars and have attempted to take photographs with a long lens on my digital slr camera which was sitting on the tripod to help eliminate camera movement. i have included the photos i have most recently taken. there are several, and i could only include 10 but will be happy to pass them all on.

i also often hear things moving in the woods at the back of my parents house before. i hear footsteps quite distinctly sometimes out there. i don't know what this noise is caused by.
content.summary: Looked like a white, red green and blue lights flashing in a triangular formation

content.detailedDescription:
Portland

how bright they were for being stationary

wasn't sure

the two objects hovered before a third one that showed up next to them appeared. the third started to move away slow before just flat out disappearing.

excited.

they just vanished.
content.summary: Two bright lights hovered above some trees when a third one appeared out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back to my mother's after visiting my brother in ames iowa, one of my younger brothers was sleeping in the back seat of the car.  i noticed a bright star like object off in the distance slightly above the horizon. this is during sunset. i didn't think a whole lot about it, but the sunset was quite beautiful,so i thought i'd take a few pics out the window, thinking i may also catch the bright light. in the first two pictures you can see the bright light just off a windmill, in the third picture the light isn't there, but in the top right corner of the picture you see a yellow object, hard to make out the shape, maybe triangular? in the fourth pic the object is no longer there, but you can see 4 small whitish objects, not sure if they're related or not. i didn't notice the object in the third or fourth pictures until i got home and took a look. this isn't the first time i've seen something like this in this area. have actually had a ufo fly over myself and an ex girlfriend about 20 feet or less off the ground, drove right under it, it appeared above us in a matter of seconds and after we went under it, it just floated out into a corn field, no noise, triangular in shape with a bright light in the center, this was 22 years ago and not far from where i saw this.
content.summary: Unusuall bright light, seemed too early for stars to be out,especially in that direction.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my father we talking as he was getting into his car to leave in london ontario canada, he got into car and i was at window i looked up at the horizon (south-southwest), and seen these three bright orange lights in a triangle formation like and acute triangle.. i instantly beckon him to look.. he got out and was in awe as was i.. it hovered for a short time then jumped into space like it was going into ftl or hyper-drive ... like from scifi.. it was insane.. t also made the cloud light up like lightning just after its ascent into space.. and it was instantaneous quicker than a blink of an eye... and it was well below the cloud cover.. we couldnt believe what we seen and he left his phone at home and mine was inside i wasnt going to risk not seeing what happened so.. i am still in shock!
content.summary: Three orange lights that seemed to slightly brighten at one point just before jumping (acending into outerspace) it seemed to be completely stationary as we watched .. when it jumped into outer space a cloud then lit up like lighting) ftl maybe

content.detailedDescription: approx 430pm, driving northbound i95 just past woodbine exit by satilla river saw a hugh silver high polished disc hovering over the marsh next to treeline about 20-30ft off ground. object seemed to be as big as a minivan. i wanted to turn around but the next exit was 10 mins down and would be to long to get back it might be gone. i didn't turn around.  i was freaked out wondering what the heck i saw and why was it in the marsh. i just so happened to look that way and saw it before i drove past.  it was tucked back almost hiding behind the treeline on the highway.
content.summary: Very large high polished silver disc hovering over marshland on the satilla river by i95

content.detailedDescription: First a white cylinder with 4 legs each with a sphere, one lit red. like a kids jack but only 4 legs. it was low and went behind trees.   then a few minutes later a red orb with white lights did the same and disappeared.
content.summary: 2 craft pass slowly, one after the other.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in southern spain. 

last night, me and my family were chilling outside our cottage, when at around 23:45 (local time), we saw a group of approx. 10 white lights (just like stars), blinking, moving and grouping in the sky. they started to form shapes, first a big circle then a vertical line and then a strange symbol like a question mark.

they moved in groups of 3 and were constantly blinking. during this entire exhibition we could see how the lights got closer and further to us at a fast speed, then something similar to a bright red shooting star crossed the area leaving a red trail. finally, the lights started to fade until they disappeared, all this lasted for 30 minutes or so, we called our friends and were shaking all the time.

10 minutes after they disappeared, some aircrafts started to overfly the area, coming from different angles but all of them going to the same spot, one every couple of minutes, which is completely unusual. 

we are all pretty sceptics with these things but when this happened, we were shaking, it was the most incredible thing we ever saw and we can’t find an explanation. i’ve searched a lot but couldn’t find anything, i found some tweets from people that may have seen the same at the same time, but just a couple and that’s all…

we’ve read about satellite lights and it’s definitely not that. 

our first thought was that it could be some drone exhibition or tests but everything that happened around it was just too weird (the red shooting star, all the aircrafts flying the area after the lights disappeared…).

tried to record this and take some pictures we didn’t have any proper equipment and our phones wouldn’t show it.
content.summary: Over 10 white lights in the sky, moving in groups of 3 forming shapes, getting closer and further

content.detailedDescription: We were on ff heading home...Google map got us lost stopped working...I noticed a yellow light with planet appearance following us above....Until someone said keep an eye on it, just then it either burned out or took off very fast...Had lights that occasionally pulsated or blinked but not like an anything man made-was different ...It seemed to hear what we were saying...Was very yellow unlike ones i've seen in iron co. in the past....I honestly felt they knew my thoughts....
content.summary: Yellow light followed us

content.detailedDescription:
On december 31st 2012, at about 10:00 pm, my then nine years old son and i were standing outdoors at the 35000 block of 26th ave south in federal way, wa.
my son called my attention to a group of objects northwest of us that looked like large, glowing orange balls moving slowly and, from our perspective, silently accross the sky. there were three arranged in a triangle, followed by four arranged in a horizontal line. they traveled from north to south, for about 20 seconds, then turned west and dissapeared beyond tree tops and structures. there were not any flashing lights or features observed and the two groups did not seem to be physically connected since, when they turned, they seemed to turn as two separate groups. it was dark, so it's hard to determine distance or altitude. it was at about 45° elevation and i estimate they were about a mile away. my first thought was that it must have been some promotion or show for new year festivities, but i know enough about aviation to know about marker and navigation lights and none of these were observed.
content.summary: Seven orange glowing orbs traveling in formation north to south then turned west and dissapeared beyond trees and structures.

content.detailedDescription: The witness was driving out of cleveland, ohio on his way home to iowa.  he had just got on interstate 80 when he noticed a disk at 25-30 degrees elevation directly in front of him and about one mile away.  the disk was traveling in a straight path from north to south and appeared to be silver on top and a dark grey on the bottom.  the disk was no lower than 500 feet and traveling approximately 100 mph.  the sighting lasted about 15 seconds as he grabbed his phone and got off one shot.  after taking the picture he noticed that the object was gone.
content.summary: Sighting near cleveland, ohio

content.detailedDescription: I was taking some pics from my backyard, with camera nikon dx40 on a steady tripod. my intention was to capture a day-by-day sequence of the conjunction of jupiter and mercury. i was supriesed when dowloaded the photos and spoted a greeny glowing object on four pics. i stacked the pics and noted it on 4 diferent positions, i looked up on stelarium software and could not identify any celestial objects on that position. so, what could it be? thanks to mufon!
content.summary: Strange companion besides jupiter and mercury, i saw it after downloading the photos

content.detailedDescription: I was taking some pics from my backyard, with camera nikon dx40 on a steady tripod. my intention was to capture a day-by-day sequence of the conjunction of jupiter and mercury. i was supriesed when dowloaded the photos and spoted a greeny glowing object on four pics. i stacked the pics and noted it on 4 diferent positions, i looked up on stelarium software and could not identify any celestial objects on that position. so, what could it be? thanks to mufon!
content.summary: Strange companion besides jupiter and mercury, i saw it after downloading the photos

content.detailedDescription: 8/20/16 i was up late couldn't sleep at around 12:30 am so i stepped outside off my front porch and looked up i saw this immediately whits and red bright light seemed to be flickering so i took my android smart phone and took photos, watched it for a couple hours that night but wasn't satisfied with the photos, so yesterday i went to toys r us and purchased a 1000hd edu science telescope and set it up with hopes the object would return, by 11:30pm it did, i took focus off the moon to observe it and what i saw was breathtaking, rotating variation of multiple light variations and sideways body movements as i set up my cell phone to the scopes eyepieces i zoomend in and caught astonishing footage and photos
content.summary: Rapidly rotating in position, flickering every color at fast speed and shape shifting observed through telescope and recorded footage along with still shot photos

content.detailedDescription: Again, this is the picture that didn't get sent with my original report
content.summary: This is the picture that didn't get sent with my original report

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the lax airport from the el segundo dog park and didn't realize at the time that i took a picture of this object until i uploaded all the pictures on my laptop.  i took 160 frames from that spot, and the object showed up in only one of the frames.  i sent it to my family, and they all agreed they've never seen anything like this, including one family member who is a former faa employee with flight experience.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the lax airport and didn't realize at the time i took a picture of this object until i uploaded them on my laptop.  i took 160 frames from that spot, and it only showed up in one of them.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Around 4:30 pm my husband called me on the phone to come out back, i ran out there and he was taping the sky, i looked and saw a black oval object in the sky hovering/floating, to big and high to be a bird or balloon. i watched it for about 3 minutes and ran in the house to get my daughter, we ran back outside and it as gone. we waited about 20 minutes and it showed back up in the same area just floating in a circle but the shape looked different in the video, more like the black night, going up and down until it went lower behind the large trees across the street from us out of view, about 2o seconds of viewing. the sky was very cloudy with large dark and white storm clouds, rain off and on. this black object as moving to slow for an airplane but about the size of one, was going in and out of the clouds. we went through the video but couldn't see it until we slowed it down a lot, frame by frame, and then you could see it shoot across the sky from different angles very fast, i would say it was as fast as lightning the normal eye could not see, as you will see in the video clips. remember, your seeing our recording already in the slowest setting possible and it still flashes across the screen( 2 different times and either it changed shape or there were more than one, and up in the right corner in another shot. the pictures are snap shots from the video, so you can see it more clearly.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Black ufo in skies over nashville tn in donelson area during dark and white storm clouds

content.detailedDescription:
This happened 10 years ago, in november 2006 , i do not remember exactly , one night i fell asleep in my living room, i woke up because of a white light that illuminates the room,i saw the tv is on but had no signal, suddenly appeared the signal of a strange creature that seemed to convey a message, after they entered the room three other beings were tall and thin with large heads , large black eyes, they looked at me and comuncaban each other, did not speak but were up to something , being of television gave them orders, and they came to me, i grabbed his arms and legs, screaming and fighting , but it was impossible to escape , they took me away from my house , i do not remember exactly where they took me , just remember that had also visited my neighbor,i woke up later and was in the room of my house, i was agitated and crying , i never asked my neighbor about this, 
after that i had strange dreams , dream flight and see the city from above , now dream with space and constellations as if i should tell something, sometimes i dream with astronauts and round ships, is that thousands of people have gone through the same and i would like to know when this is over, if esque them come for me again, i do not know but this is something i wanted to tell you , i hope will be helpful , and for me too , thanks
content.summary: I was abducted by unknown beings in my house overnight

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Around 4:30 pm my husband called me on the phone to come out back, i ran out there and he was taping the sky, i looked and saw a black oval object in the sky hovering/floating, to big and high to be a bird or balloon. i watched it for about 3 minutes and ran in the house to get my daughter, we ran back outside and it as gone. we waited about 20 minutes and it showed back up in the same area just floating in a circle but the shape looked different in the video, more like the black night, going up and down until it went lower behind the large trees across the street from us out of view, about 2o seconds of viewing. the sky was very cloudy with large dark and white storm clouds, rain off and on. this black object as moving to slow for an airplane but about the size of one, was going in and out of the clouds. we went through the video but couldn't see it until we slowed it down a lot, frame by frame, and then you could see it shoot across the sky from different angles very fast, i would say it was as fast as lightning the normal eye could not see, as you will see in the video clips. remember, your seeing our recording already in the slowest setting possible and it still flashes across the screen( 2 different times and either it changed shape or there were more than one, and up in the right corner in another shot. the pictures are snap shots from the video, so you can see it more clearly.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Black ufo in skies over nashville tn in donelson area during dark and white storm clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my children at home. my daughter grabbed me from the living room, and brought me out to see the blinking lights that moved in the sky. she was 9 years old. she said they were "watching" her.

i was on the phone with a friend, and it was night time, around 8 p.M. my daughter pointed to them, and asked me to watch as the shapes in the sky moved around as though they were following each other. 

i stayed on the phone talking with a friend who was watching the same thing(s) move in the sky. she lived 5 miles away, ne direction and about 500 ft higher in elevation. i was next to the kohala mountain range, at 2000 ft altitude in rural hawaii, subdivision.

my daughter, my son (age 5) watched the crafts moved around in the sky, lights were flashing colors, and appeared to be communicating to each other in sequence.

this display in the sky was amazing, beautiful and unusual. i don't know what it was.

the crafts moved in all directions. finally, departing. the time frame was approximately 2 hours. by that time, only a few of the crafts remain in the sky.

this memory stays with me in full detail, and has made me question what is truly happening with ufo and et connect and humanity. we are definitely not alone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I watched the event with several crafts in the air.

content.detailedDescription: My 12-year-old grandson and i were walking along the street that runs in back of his house in homer city, pennsylvania, at about 8:00 on the evening of august 19, 2016.  i had my camera with me, a canon powershot digital ("point and shoot") and was taking photos of the sunset.  on our way, i decided to take a black and white photo of the church steeple on top of the hope evangelical lutheran church.  i did not see anything other than the steeple as i carefully focused my camera and took the picture.  when i got home later that evening, and looked at the photos i had taken, i noticed this unidentified object in the sky to the right of the church steeple.  the evening was mostly clear, and there was little or no wind.  i had not observed anything unusual in the sky prior to snapping the picture.  what is somewhat strange about all of this, is that the previous evening, august 18, i had been researching ufo sightings reported in the youngstown, ohio area. (that is where i was born and raised.)  i was particularly interested in an encounter which occurred in february of 1994.  this encounter was well-documented.  it fascinated me because of the location where the ufo was first seen, on sampson drive, which is quite near where i originally lived.  it just seems weird that i had an unidentified object show up in a photo i took, the night after i had been researching ufo's on my computer.
content.summary: Unidentified object showed up in photo

content.detailedDescription: A group of people and i witnessed several objects while at oaks amusement park on august 20th, 2016 around 1 pm. at first glance we figured they were balloons, however we noticed they were spiraling in a continuous circle, disappearing and then reappearing, this was during a 100° day with very little wind. i filmed this towards the end of the sighting as i hadn't thought to pull my phone out until then. we were all very puzzled were trying different explanations for what it was. the clearest view of the objects are in the beginning and the end of the attached video.
content.summary: Group witnessed ufo's / uap's over oaks amusement park, portland, oregon

content.detailedDescription:
We used to live up on a hill about 5 miles (as the crow flies) from where i live now. we used to sit on the back patio and watch a ufo (just like this one) play on the horizon, to the south, over the city of athol, mass. it would dance around for hours and hours without landing, it would strobe and roil all kinds of right colors, get extremely bright, get extremely dim, shoot across the sky over the brattleboro, vt area, then return to its favored place over athol. then one day, it just sort of stopped being there all the time. we were basically capable of watching it anytime we wanted from about dusk-onward for the entire summer of 2013, though. it became commonplace, as crazy as that sounds. and then it wasn't there anymore, or at least definitely not regularly.

since those days, i've actually moved in the very direction of athol, mass, still within the state of nh, about 2 miles off the border with mass. our road, rt.32, is actually called "athol rd". follow it, and you will be in athol in about 15 minutes.

tonight i was coming home from work at about 10pm when i turned left onto rt.32 from rt.119. instantly, a little ball of fire hovering in the sky caught my attention directly ahead, toward athol.  i immediately became suspect, but also wanted to make sure it wasn't a hovering flare that someone might have shot off, or something.

the fire was much more dull than a flare; it cast no light on anything. as i moved south toward it, i realized it was moving toward me. i made very sure that it had no blinking "faa"-type lights. as soon as i was content that it did not, i stopped the car and killed the engine and lights right in the middle of the road (it's ok, we're extremely rural). i fumbled for my phone and tried to get it unlocked so i could take video, but i failed to do so in time.

the object was exactly the same thing we used to see dancing on the horizon over athol, but now it was passing directly over my head in the pitch darkness. i would estimate that it was no more than 400 feet in altitude, seemed to be following rt.32 north toward keene, roughly, and was maybe the size of a subcompact car. it was moving...Probably about 35-45mph, land speed.  when we used to watch it moving between athol and vt, though, it would dart very quickly, covering 30-40 miles in just a couple of seconds. it can really move when it wants to. tonight though, it was just very subdued, slow, moving willfully but not fast at all.

i was able to get a really good look at it, as it went right over my head. it was pretty much formless. it looks like a splotch of hot-pink fire, with hues of orange, and subdued/dulled flashes of blue and green.  it was perfectly soundless; dead silent.

i rolled down the road hoping to find my friends at their campfire pit, where they surely would have seen it cross over their property. they were indeed sitting at their campfire pit, but they had no fire going and were facing in the wrong direction.  it passed literally about 300 feet behind them only a minute or two before, and they didn't even hear it. i think it should be noted that this is also the only time i've ever come here to find them facing in the direction they opted to face this night. any other night, and they would've been facing in the direction of the object.
content.summary: Following rt32 northbound, went right over my head. i got out of the car and watched it.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside waiting for my dog when i noticed the first object. it appeared out of nowhere to the ne, below 2 faint stars. it appeared very bright then appeared to travel away from me drifting back and forth as it went. after about 15 seconds it faded away. almost immediately after that another one appeared in the exact same spot and did the same thing. then the third one appeared just below and north of the first two. i think this was a satellite as it traveled directly south across the sky. no turns or drifting back and forth. much more faint than the 1st two. although it didn't fade in and out as satellites often do. i watched it for about 4 mins until i could nolonger see it. when i saw the 1st one i called to two people inside to view this. they did not come out in time to see the 1st two but did see the third.
content.summary: 3 separate lights (crafts) 2 appeared out of nowhere, very bight, travel not straight then faded. 1 traveled across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on m 1 highway in gladstone, missouri with my niece.We both noticed real bright lights in the sky southwest of us.  we were talking about how it was just hovering with no blinking lights like airplanes or helicopters have.It just sat in one spot. we were watching it for maybe two minutes joking that it might be a ufo then it just disappeared. it never moved and there were no clouds at all in the sky. it just disappeared! we were shocked and couldn't believe what we had just seen.
content.summary: Really bright lights hovering then just disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my patio outside, looking at the stars. when i see one slowly moving back and forth. it looked like it had a small line through the star, which could've been a disk. but i know, stars do not move back and forth like that. it had disappeared behind the clouds when trying to spot it again.
content.summary: Sitting on patio, when i look up at stars and see one go back-and-forth, it looked like a star, but stars don't do that.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my front porch facing south looking at the stars. i do this almost every night just for the view.Then all of the sudden from east to west i saw what i first thought was a plane or shooting star. it wasn't it couldn't have been there were no strobing lights on it which all aircraft have if i'm not mistaken. that and the speed of a commercial airliner moves 6 to 800 mph and it takes a minute or so to go in and out of sight across the horizon. this object went from one side of the sky to the other in seconds. it had to be moving over 2000mph. i know it sounds crazy but i saw what i saw. it didn't dip or lose altitude or leave a trail like a shooting star or commit. this was just weird come to think of it about 2 or 3 weeks ago i did see what i thought may be a asteroid impact facing south. i was in my front porch star gazing then as well it had the largest trail i had seen. it looked as if it may have hit within a mile or so but never heard anything from anyone in the area.
content.summary: I just saw a star shaped light go straifht across the sky much fast than anything ive ever seen. i know it waant a jet it was too faat and no strobing light

content.detailedDescription: Went to take out garbage.  looking up at some stars and saw some strange orange/red orb flying over the tree line.  it kept flying towards me then right over me.  it kept going in a straight line over the other tree line and then vanished.
content.summary: Saw something flying overhead with no sound
